settings.title: Settings
settings.installDesc: Add to home screen for better experience
settings.updateDesc: A new version is ready to install
settings.localStorageDesc: Your data is stored locally on this device. Make sure to back up important information.
settings.privacyDesc: Your financial data never leaves your device. Everything is stored securely in your browser.
settings.aboutAppDesc: StudyBudget Pro is a comprehensive personal finance management app designed for students studying abroad.
settings.backupDesc: Backup your data or restore from a previous backup
settings.importDataDesc: Restore your data from a previous backup file. This will replace all current data.
settings.backupNote1: Backups are stored locally on your device
settings.backupNote2: Importing will replace all current data
settings.backupNote3: Always create a backup before importing
settings.backupNote4: Backup files contain sensitive financial information
settings.backupNote5: Keep backup files secure and private
settings.syncStatusDesc: Your data is automatically synced when you're online. Offline changes are queued and will sync when your connection is restored.
settings.syncErrorDesc: Some operations failed to sync. Check your connection.
settings.resetDataDesc: Permanently delete all data including accounts, transactions, and categories. This action cannot be undone.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Financial Overview
dashboard.welcomeSubtitle: Your personal budgeting companion for studying abroad

new: Click "Add Account" to start tracking your finances
Record every transaction promptly to build good habits
Check statistics regularly to understand spending patterns
active: Set budget goals to control spending
Use categories to better manage your finances
Back up data regularly to ensure data security
experienced: Use advanced statistics to analyze your financial situation
Set up automatic categorization rules to improve efficiency
Export financial reports to share with accountants or advisors

welcomeSection.description: A smart accounting tool designed for international students, making your financial management simpler and more secure
welcomeSection.smartCategorizationDesc: Automatically identify transaction types, saving recording time
welcomeSection.multiCurrencyDesc: Support for major global currencies, perfect for international students
welcomeSection.offlineSyncDesc: Record even without internet, automatic data synchronization
welcomeSection.dataSecurityDesc: Local storage, privacy protection, secure and reliable data
welcomeSection.startJourney: Start your smart accounting journey, make every expense meaningful, and make financial management easy and enjoyable!
